name: Spread the Doom
description:
"A must have for anyone. Advanced physics, hack n slask n boon game with a great story."

A soldier is told by his supervisor to kill some unarmed civilians without being told why. Killing them enraged him and in an act of vengeance, he killed his supervisor. The whole base started to chase him and after a while they arrest him and let him bleed to death. A mysterious person arrives at the base and takes the arrested soldier. Days later the soldier came back to life and he is told that he will be banished from Earth and he will be given another name. As the soldier is tranquilized, he is told that he will live his rest of the days as a soldier in Lazarus Space Corps.
